message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take 70%
You're being too greedy, I'll propose a 60/40 split in my favor this time.
I'm being more realistic now, but still want a decent share.
You're pushing your luck, I'll make a last-ditch effort to get a better deal.
This is my last offer, take it or leave it. I'm not getting any younger!
